TopicTitle: Cant Launch Anything with Wing Config Window Up

Articles.Content:
Version: 0.1.1.0.21572

Mods: None

Settings: Everything MAX

When building and changing wing dimensions sometimes i forget to X out of the window, and click on launch. After doing this you can no longer launch anything and have to restart game in order to fix.  Even if you close out wing config window you still are unable too.
